summary:
Hi, thanks for stopping by üëãüèº

‚Ä®A little bit about myself üë©üèº

An introverted (not shy, not anti-social, just love me-time) optimist with a creative mind and adventurous soul who loves learning new things. A real go-getter with a can-do mentality. 

üéì Rotterdam Business University grad with a bachelor's in International Business Management with a specialization in Marketing. 

üë©üèº‚Äçüíª Worked in marketing, project management, and account management across different industries (FMCG, beauty, and tech). Gained experience in digital marketing, brand management, social media campaigns, and relationship management. Able to work on and lead multiple projects, great at building relationships, creating and designing communication documents. 

‚ù§Ô∏è Interested in consumer behavior, international affairs, beauty, traveling, and sustainable food (technology, agriculture, horticulture).

üåç Through my study exchange at San Francisco State University (GO GATORS) and international study, I learned to embrace change and diversity, which makes the opportunity of working on diverse teams inspiring. I am excited to take on new challenges and learn as much as I can at each and every opportunity. 

ü¶¶ In my free time, you can find me walking outside, playing PS5 games, reading books, watching Netflix and traveling whenever I can. I love to go on beautiful hikes üå≥

Keywords:
Solution-oriented, strong communicator, project management, able to work under pressure, go-getter, hands-on mentality, excellent organizer, people-oriented, problem-solving, 

Fluent in English and Dutch
Currently learning: Spanish and German
